title: Prosecutor reported fired by Trump admin after hesitancy on Comey case
shortDescription: A Justice Department prosecutor was reportedly fired after saying he would struggle to take on the James Comey case alongside other responsibilities.

title: Trump shares Wikipedia page calling him 'Acting President of Venezuela'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump shared a screenshot of a Wikipedia page that listed his title as the 'Acting President of Venezuela.' Who is it actually?

title: Greenland, NATO push back as Trump says US 'going to have' territory
shortDescription: Trump told reporters that Greenland's only defense is 'two dog sleds,' as the Arctic island government warns it 'cannot accept' a US takeover.

title: White House slams Powell's 'bad job'
shortDescription: White House criticized Jerome Powellâ€™s performance when asked about threats to indict the Fed chair, while affirming the Fed's independence.

title: Who will lead Venezuela? Trump set to meet with opposition leader
shortDescription: Trump declined to back opposition leader Maria Corina Machado in the immediate aftermath of the US attack on Venezuela and ouster of its president.

title: Trump threatens to sideline ExxonMobil from accessing Venezuela's oil
shortDescription: President Trump said he's "inclined" to shut ExxonMobil out from accessing oil in Venezuela, saying the company is "playing too cute."

title: Trump: Greenland interest is not for short-term
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the aim is to acquire Greenland, not to lease it or have it "short-term."

title: Trump calls for 10% cap on credit card interest rates. What's average?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has said there will be a one-year cap on credit card interest rates set at 10%. What is the average? Can he even do that?

title: Trump warns credit card firms ahead of January 10% rate cap
shortDescription: Trump said that credit card companies would be in violation of the law if they failed to comply by January 20 with a 10% cap on interest rates.

title: Trump photo claims 'acting president' of Venezuela
shortDescription: President Donald Trump posted a photo that mimics a Wikipedia page declaring himself the "Acting President of Venezuela."

title: Trump touts himself as 'Acting President of Venezuela'
shortDescription: Trump told Cuba in a social media post to "make a deal" before it's "TOO LATE."

title: Trump weighs military options in Iran
shortDescription: Anti-government protests in Iran have become increasingly deadly as they enter a third week.

title: Trump weighs military options in Iran as violence escalates
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he's considering multiple military options after anti-government protests in the country have turned increasingly deadly.

title: Trump says he's 'inclined' to keep Exxon out of Venezuela
shortDescription: The president told reporters on Air Force One on his way back to Washington that the company's CEO was 'playing too cute.'
